oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Capt. Luke J. Weathers Jr. Day
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weathers, Luke, Jr.; Lee, George W.; military; parades;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Luke Weathers riding in the parade with Lt. George W. Lee on Capt. Luke J. Weathers Jr. Day. Weathers was the first African-American in Memphis to be given the key to the city and to be honored with such a day.
